name: Bobo and Todd's Excellent Adventure (srawls)
description: Spencer Rawls was the lead programmer on Texas Aggie Game Developers' group project for the fall of 2015: Bobo and Todd's Excellent Adventure. This side-scrolling beat 'em up game featured local cooperative multiplayer with two unique playable characters: the heavy brute Todd and the fragile gunner Bobo. Travel back in time to stop alien invaders from changing our history, either solo or with a friend.
